item.description:
Sorry for posting this so late in the week. If anyone's interested, let's try to play on Saturday morning. Showers, to my knowledge, will be in the afternoon.

Watch this site on late Friday afternoon in case I find out that nets are down. If they are, a cancellation will be posted.

We only have limited days left to play so it'll be nice see anyone who shows up. Stay in touch with questions or comments. My number is 860-559-7983. Thanks.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis - Saturday
